titles: Mense Iunii. anno regni metue[n]dissimi d[omi]ni u[e]ri regio Henrici octaui .xxii. A proclamation made and diuysed by the kyngis highnes, with the aduise of his most honorable counsaile, for punishinge of vacabundes and sturdy beggars
author: England. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)
publisher: Tho. Bertheletus regius impressor excusit. Cum priuilegio,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries.
keywords: Rogues and vagabonds --  Early works to 1800.
Begging --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
